db package

Submodules

db.es module

db/es.py

ElasticSearch cluster and CSV file

Connect to Elasticsearch cluster

Search results from Elasticsearch cluster by body dict with size and from parameters

Search by field in Elasticsearch cluster by field question or answer or both question and answer

db.es.es_conn() → Elasticsearch[исходный код]

Connect to Elasticsearch cluster

Результат:

Elasticsearch object

async db.es.search_by_field(question_text: str, pagination_size: int, pagination_from: int, search_field: str) → list[dict][исходный код]

Search by field in Elasticsearch cluster by field question or answer or both question and answer

Параметры:

  • question_text – str

  • pagination_size – int

  • pagination_from – int

  • search_field – str

Результат:

list of dicts with search results from Elasticsearch cluster by field question or answer or both question and answer

async db.es.search_result(body: dict) → list[dict][исходный код]

Search results from Elasticsearch cluster by body dict with size and from parameters

Параметры:

body – dict

Результат:

list of dicts

db.loader module

db/loader.py

Load data from csv file to Elasticsearch cluster

Check and create index in Elasticsearch cluster by index_name parameter

Check is data in Elasticsearch cluster by index_name parameter

Load data from csv file to Elasticsearch cluster by index_name parameter

db.loader.check_index(index_name: str) → None[исходный код]

Check and create index in Elasticsearch cluster by index_name parameter

Параметры:

index_name – str

Результат:

None

db.loader.check_is_data(index_name: str, es: Elasticsearch) → None[исходный код]

Check is data in Elasticsearch cluster by index_name parameter

Параметры:

  • es – Elasticsearch

  • index_name – str

Результат:

None

db.loader.load_data(es: Elasticsearch, index_name: str) → None[исходный код]

Load data from csv file to Elasticsearch cluster by index_name parameter

Параметры:

  • es – Elasticsearch

  • index_name – str

Результат:

None
